title: Malta risks higher medicine prices under wastewater directive, warns MEP [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Malta is already among Europe’s worst in access to innovative medicines, MEP Peter Agius warns that the EU's wastewater rules risk driving prices higher
summary_public: Malta is already among Europe’s worst in access to innovative medicines, MEP Peter Agius warns that the EU's wastewater rules risk driving prices higher

MT.label: negative
